title: Narcotics: the decision (D)
creator_contributor_role: United Research and Training Production, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Youth - Drug use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Narcotics
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug addiction
description: Shows how a teenage girl seeking the adult world turns to cigarettes and liquor. She is then introduced to marijuana, tries heroin, and suddenly is surrounded by a network of smugglers and drug pedlars. Shows how drugs are injected and the excruciating pain addicts suffer when unable to get a "fix". Please Note This film is not suitable for screening to children under fifteen. It is suggested the film be previewed for suitability to the proposed audience before screening. Warning: SOME SCENES MAY DISTURB.
